mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Zachary Taylor to Mrs. E[leanor] P[arke Custis] Lewis, 1849 March 27
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taylor, Zachary, 1784-1850
mdRecord.dcterms:description: President Zachary Taylor writes from Washington, D. C. to Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis in Berryville, Clarke Co., Virginia. Thanks for her interest in him and his family--her family always welcome at the White House--fear they will not find time to visit Audley while in Washington. Letter, 2 pages, signature cut out, written in another hand. Envelope franked by Z. Taylor, postmarked "Free [ ]," laminated, watermark (H & O).
